bioconda.name: ssake
bioconda.summary: SSAKE is a genomics application for de novo assembly of millions of very short DNA sequences.

biocontainers.name: ssake
biocontainers.summary: A program for assemblying short dna sequences. the program cycles through sequence data stored in a hash table and progressively searches through a prefix tree for the longest possible k-mer between any two sequencis.

biotools.summary: A program for assemblying short DNA sequences. The program cycles through sequence data stored in a hash table and progressively searches through a prefix tree for the longest possible k-mer between any two sequencis.

bioschemas.name: SSAKE
bioschemas.summary: A program for assemblying short DNA sequences. The program cycles through sequence data stored in a hash table and progressively searches through a prefix tree for the longest possible k-mer between any two sequencis.
